org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRSessionStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRSessionStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRSessionStatus
extends Struct
    Specifies status information for the current session.

    ovrSessionStatus members

    MemberTypeDescription
    HasVrFocusovrBooltrue if the process has VR focus and thus is visible in the HMD
    HmdPresentovrBooltrue if an HMD is present

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRSessionStatus

        public OVRSessionStatus(long struct)
        Creates a OVRSessionStatus instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRSessionStatus

        public OVRSessionStatus(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRSessionStatus instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
